TopicTitle: SpaceX Hyperloop Competition live Stream (29-Jan and 30-Jan)

Articles.Content:
This is the live stream feed for the SpaceX Hyperloop Competition being held at Texas A&M. It starts at 12:00 Noon Central with opening ceremonies and will end at 6:45 PM. The awards are given out on 30-Jan from 3:30 to 5:30 PM central. The competition is only the design phase where over 100 teams will submit their designs for review and hope to move on to the testing phase held this summer.

NOTE: This does not contain footage of the pods going at high speeds on a test track. In fact, no footage of the pods at all. This is footage of:

1. The opening ceremonies

2. Closing statements on Friday

3. Awards ceremony on Saturday

 

The times are found in the comments below the video player at this link.

http://www.ustream.tv/channel/uAPmkVhqjrx

Edited January 29, 2016 by Tex Mechs Robot

They currently have sound issues.

EDIT: Sound's fixed.

Hopefully we'll get to see the pod designs and presentations today though. Keeping my fingers crossed :-)
